orbconformal.distances¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

l2_dist(mat1, mat2)

calculate l2 distance between two matrices

l2_dist_lots2one(mat1, data_array)

calculate l2 distance between a matrix and an array of matrices

l2_dist_matrix(X_array, Y_array=None)

calculates a distance matrix between two areas of multivariate functions
orbconformal.distances.l2_dist(mat1, mat2)[source]¶

calculate l2 distance between two matrices

Parameters

  • mat1 (numpy.ndarray) – numpy array (n, p)

  • mat2 (numpy.ndarray) – numpy array (n, p)

Returns

l2 distance between matrices

Return type

float

orbconformal.distances.l2_dist_lots2one(mat1, data_array)[source]¶

calculate l2 distance between a matrix and an array of matrices

Parameters

  • mat1 (numpy.ndarray) – numpy array (n, p)

  • data_array (numpy.ndarray) – numpy array (r,n,p) treat each row (relative to first index) as a new matrix

Returns

numpy vector (r,) of l2 distances between mat1 and data_array[r]

Return type

numpy.ndarray

orbconformal.distances.l2_dist_matrix(X_array, Y_array=None)[source]¶

calculates a distance matrix between two areas of multivariate functions

Parameters

  • X_array (numpy.ndarray) – numpy array (r, n, p), array of multivariate functions (each row is one funciton)

  • Y_array (numpy.ndarray) – numpy array (t, n, p), array of multivariate functions (each row is one funciton). Default is None (if so, then X_array is used)

Returns

numpy array (r, t) of distances between X_array[r] and Y_array[t]

Return type

numpy.ndarray
